default.fd6aaf80-51dc-495f-9d8f-a7329a59f601: Thanks for reaching out! We'll get back to you soon.

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeInUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

text.en: Give an animal a forever home through adoption or provide ongoing support through our sponsorship programs.

_ww-text_text.en: Give an animal a forever home through adoption or provide ongoing support through our sponsorship programs.

text.en: Our focus areas for animal welfare

_ww-text_text.en: Our focus areas for animal welfare

text.en: Connecting hearts to create a better world for animals

_ww-text_text.en: Connecting hearts to create a better world for animals

text.en: In India, millions of stray animals face daily struggles for survival. Animal Mitra was born from the urgent need to create a unified platform where compassionate citizens, dedicated NGOs, and passionate volunteers can come together to make a difference. We believe in the power of community action to transform the lives of our street animals through rescue operations, medical care, adoption programs, and ongoing support systems.

_ww-text_text.en: In India, millions of stray animals face daily struggles for survival. Animal Mitra was born from the urgent need to create a unified platform where compassionate citizens, dedicated NGOs, and passionate volunteers can come together to make a difference. We believe in the power of community action to transform the lives of our street animals through rescue operations, medical care, adoption programs, and ongoing support systems.

text.en: Three simple steps to make a difference

text.en: Spot an animal in need? Report it through our app or contact our network of rescuers for immediate assistance.

text.en: Contribute through donations, volunteering your time, or providing resources to help animals in need.

text.en: A community-driven platform for animal welfare

text.en: Download our app and start making a difference today

_ww-text_text.en: Download our app and start making a difference today

text.en: We'd love to hear from you

_ww-text_text.en: We'd love to hear from you

text.en: Animal Mitra is a compassionate platform connecting NGOs, volunteers, and citizens to rescue, adopt, and support stray animals across India. Our mission is to create a world where every animal is treated with kindness and respect.

_ww-text_text.en: Animal Mitra is a compassionate platform connecting NGOs, volunteers, and citizens to rescue, adopt, and support stray animals across India. Our mission is to create a world where every animal is treated with kindness and respect.

text.en: This is an important message that provides additional context and information about the current situation. Please read it carefully and take any necessary actions.

defaultValue.name: Priya Sharma
defaultValue.quote: I adopted through Animal Mitra and now sponsor 2 dogs monthly.

defaultValue.name: Rahul Verma
defaultValue.quote: The platform made it easy to connect with local NGOs and make a difference.

defaultValue.name: Anjali Patel
defaultValue.quote: Thanks to Animal Mitra, I found my perfect companion and support the cause.
